blog.name: sarahpetrastellington
blog.title: Sarah Petra Stellington
blog.description: My name is Sarah Petra Stellington, but just call me Sarah. I'm a 16-year-old teenager who loves video games, classical music, ballet, and drawing. I'm also very shy and get scared very easily, but I tend to be brave and courageous. I'm a HUGE fan of Minecraft: Story Mode, an awesomely amazing game where you create your own story by choices and decisions you make. Mario, Kirby, and Sonic the Hedgehog are my all-time favorites too as I have a lot of games from those video game franchises. Coming in closer, Katie Ellie Stellington, my best friend and family member, is always there for me, and is very willing to help me throughout my adventures. Luigi (my smol bean), Sonic (The speedy Blue Blur), Kirby (my pet pink puffball and extremely loyal companion), and Petra (best redhead female warrior softy) are my number one. Man, will it be awesome, and there is A LOT you guys may not know about me yet, so stay tuned! 😉

summary: So, I heard today that Reggie Fils-Aime is retiring as a President of Nintendo of America. He meant the world to me, and I will...
caption:
So, I heard today that Reggie Fils-Aime is retiring as a President of Nintendo of America. He meant the world to me, and I will NEVER forget meeting him for the first time in person during E3 2014. It’s been a huge journey with him. I mean, the news ISN’T that upsetting for me because well… I respect his decision to retire because he wants to spend more time with his family, and I’m perfectly okay with that. Thank you, Reggie, for everything. We still love you.

Aside from that, Nintendo has also announced that once Reggie retires on April 15th, 2019, Doug Bowser will become a new Nintendo of America president, and I’m pretty stoked about it! Welcome to the team, Mr. Bowser! It’s a pretty chill day for Nintendo, I guess. :)

body:
Goodbye Reggie

Reggie, Nintendo of America president, is retiring. He’s been a great president for the many memes he’s spawned and for all the love he has for nintendo. His retirement video is on YouTube saying goodbye. Doug Bowser will be taking over in April and I wish him luck. From what I’ve seen, Bowser has a love for Nintendo so I think the position is being passed to the right hands.

tags: Aragami: Shadow Edition ya está disponible en Nintendo Switch
summary: Aragami: Shadow Edition ya está disponible en Nintendo Switch
title: Aragami: Shadow Edition ya está disponible en Nintendo Switch
body:
Merge y Lince Works, anunciaron que Aragami: Shadow Edition ahora está disponible en el Nintendo Switch en versiones físicas y digitales e incluye la versión base de Aragami, más la expansión Aragami Nightfall y todos los DLC disponible. Aragami te lanza como un asesino no muerto con el poder de controlar las sombras. Al manipular […]

La entrada Aragami: Shadow Edition ya está disponible en Nintendo Switch aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL
